items.summary: Update the post-"Yes" looping tap sequence component (frontend/src/components/YesTapSequence.tsx) to remove the third image step so the sequence contains only: Step 1 = IMG-20260210-WA0002.jpg, Step 2 = IMG-20260210-WA0000.jpg, Step 3 = the existing final love message text. Keep the looping behavior so tapping the final message returns to Step 1.

Ensure the post-"Yes" tap transitions feel instant by preloading the remaining sequence images (IMG-20260210-WA0002.jpg and IMG-20260210-WA0000.jpg) before the user reaches them, so there is no visible loading delay when the user taps to advance.
Remove the unused third image asset from the frontend public assets if it exists (IMG-20260210-WA0001.jpg) and ensure there are no remaining references to it in the codebase.
